text: Agar ʙa hangomi hac talaʙ kuned ruziero az Parvardigoraton ʙo foida ʙurdan az savdo dar ajjomi hac, gunahgor nasudaed va cun ʙa'di guruʙi oftoʙ az Arafot ʙozgastaed, Allohro dar Mas'arulharom ʙo tasʙehu takʙir va du'o jod kuned, ki sumoro ʙa rohi rost hidojat farmud, haroina pes az in az on gumrohon ʙuded, haqro namedonisted
